fspDisplayName.tl: Ipadala ang supermarket voucher sa aking WhatsApp
fspDisplayName.en: Send supermarket voucher to my WhatsApp

label.tl:
Kung ikaw ay kasali, ipapadala namin ang iyong Supermarket voucher sa pamamagitan ng WhatsApp.

Paki bahagi ang iyong phone number sa WhatsApp.

Ito ay maaring pareho ng ginagamit mong phone number pang-SMS.
label.en:
If you are included, we send your Supermarket voucher via WhatsApp.

Please share the phone number you use for WhatsApp.

This can be the same number you use for SMS.
